name: 5 Of 'Em
description:
Android and standalone game about you and five of your fingers.

#SGDAGameJam game made in 48 hours by Jeff Harper, Amanda Fisher, and Cameron Ayres. Sound editing by Albert Chang. Song is "Bring Back My Blushing Rose" by John Steel.

Thanks for downloading and playing the Game Jam version of 5 of 'Em. We are currently making some small changes in preparation for release on the Google Play Store. We also hope to release Mac, iPhone, and Gear VR versions sometime in the near future, so watch this space.
